document.full_text: russia joined western leaders on friday in urging libyan leader muammar gaddafi to step down and offered to mediate his departure, in an important boost to nato powers seeking to end his 41-year rule.
document.title: russia joins western chorus for gaddafi to go
lines_and_colors: russia joined western leaders on friday in urging libyan leader muammar gaddafi to step down and offered to mediate his departure, in an important boost to nato powers seeking to end his 41-year rule.
